Description:
LARGE FAMILY HOME IN GROWTH POCKET
This 2 storey 5bd, 3 bath, 4 car family home SCREAMS POTENTIAL.
Set on 735m2 block in a quiet court in growing Whittington, this property can be "move in now, renovate later" or rent out tomorrow.
Offering a large front living room with ceiling fans and built in heater.
A separate dining room positioned off the kitchen which seats up to 8.
The central kitchen has been updated less than 2 years ago and offers Smeg Dishwasher, 6 plate induction cooktop and fantastic dual oven.
There is also a handy informal meals area for all your family needs.
Down the hall you will find 3 good size bedrooms, all with BIR and 1 bedroom with ensuite offering shower and vanity.
There is also a 2nd bathroom with shower over bath and separate toilet.
Upstairs is the parents retreat offering a 2nd lounge room with ceiling fan and reverse cycle split system for all year round comfort. There are also an additional two bedrooms, 1 with BIR and great natural light and the spacious master bedroom with loads of storage, BIR and corner ensuite offering shower, toilet and heatlamps.
Outside you will find a double carport and DLUG ready to be reclaimed. It also has a great undercover pergola area perfect for summer BBQ's, and a rear grassed yard and dog run for all your family or pets needs.
FEATURES
735m2
Quiet court
Updated Kitchen
Rent pw $370
Insights: 1 other 5 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
Investors line up.
This spacious corner allotment of 609 square metres (approx.) boasts dual access and is ideally located close to schools, local conveniences and public transport.
Comprising of three bedrooms all with built in robes, open plan kitchen/dining area, separate lounge room off the kitchen and bathroom.
Internal features include gas heating, reverse cycle air conditioning, ceiling fan in the living area and gas upright cooking.
Externally enjoy the undercover entertaining area, spacious rear yard and ample parking including a double lock up garage all within a secure established setting.
Currently on a periodic lease at $250 per week.
Photo ID Required

Description:
Big Block with Endless Potential
Calling all developers and savvy investors. On offer is an opportunity to make money! But you'll need to act quickly to secure this prime position close to all amenities! Located only a few minutes from the CBD the Whittington area could be considered as the next growth suburb by many so get in before it becomes out of reach. With 725sqm (approx.) on offer in a court location, the opportunities are endless - enjoy the convenience of a spacious rear yard, add a second dwelling or simply wipe the slate clean and develop potentially lucrative townhouses (STCA). The immaculate presented brick veneer home is sure to suit the astute purchaser with Bellarine Village and Newcomb Shopping Centres, medical facilities, public transport, Newcomb Primary School and Newcomb Secondary College all close by. The home offers 2 bedrooms with BIRs. Lounge is gas heated with air conditioning and with a well-appointed kitchen/meals area which overlooks the rear timber deck and the lush gardens. Other features include tandem garage and 5000lt water tank. Make your move and secure this terrific location. Move in and enjoy the huge backyard, cash in on the expansive land, or start development plans - the sky is the limit!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Large 654 m2 Corner Block
So much potential to develop (S.T.C.A) on this large corner block for an eager developer or is ready to rent out. if you prefer to invest and for the first home owner just move in this three bedroom one bathroom brick home has been recently renovated including updated light filled open plan kitchen new carpet and timber floating floors, fresh paint and a brand new bathroom with separate shower and bath it also features stylish tiles to give that modern touch. All three bedrooms consist of built in robes with wall to wall carpet, main also has a ceiling fan. Relax in the lounge with air conditioner and ceiling fan. Enjoy the spacious backyard a dream for the handy man with a large shed to store all those tools and if you have children there is plenty of space for equipment and entertaining to keep them busy. Easy access to public transport, local schools and shops close by and just a short drive to Splashdown and the Bellarine Village. A Rental Estimate of- $310-$320pw.

Description:
Love at First Sight!
With neutral tones and low maintenance gardens, this property is ideal for first home buyers and investors alike with an expected rental return of $260-$270 a week. Light and airy, the home boasts 2 bedrooms; master with built-in-robe, centrally located bathroom and open plan living and kitchen with gas appliances. The generous yard with paved entertaining area is the perfect place to relax and unwind. An oversized single lock-up garage and garden shed complete this property. Ideally set opposite Grinter Reserve, close to primary and secondary schools, shops and minutes to public transport, you'll fall in love with this neat and tidy home!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Immaculate Family Home on App. 980m2!
Space, style and a stunning outlook complement this beautifully presented home set on approximately 980 square metres in an increasingly popular location. Tastefully updated this spacious family home is comprised of 3 generous bedrooms, all with built-in robes, ceiling fans and wall-to-wall carpet, 2 massive living rooms including open plan kitchen, dining and living plus rumpus that leads out to a simply stunning enclosed undercover entertainment area that will make having friends over all year round an absolute pleasure. The keen amateur chef will fall in love with the cleverly designed kitchen that is complete with stainless steel oven, dishwasher, walk-in pantry, breakfast bar, walk-in pantry and a plethora of storage and cupboard space for extra convenience. Additional extras include reverse cycle heating and cooling unit in the lounge, wood heater, timber flooring along with high quality carpet in the living room. The monstrous rear yard is the ideal place for the kids to play in complete privacy while there is ample car accommodation with a 4 car lock-up garage and work shop space and for those that require public transport there's bus routes that will take you to all that Geelong and the Bellarine has to offer located close by. Nearby amenities include Gordon TAFE, Bellarine Village, Newcomb Centro, Splashdown and all ovals, tennis courts and sporting facilities. This one has it all and with room for further development (S.T.C.A.) it will appeal to all types of buyers. Be the one and get in fast!
Insights: 4 Pandora Court, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2017 and 30 other 3 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
Loving family home.
Cute as a button brick home located on a 680 square metre allotment. With a little cosmetic makeover this property has the potential to return $260 - $280 rent per week.
Consisting of two bedrooms both with built in robes and ceiling fans, open plan lounge/dining area with gas heating and airconditioning, adjacent kitchen with gas upright stove and central family bathroom.
The property is further enhanced with a secure outbuilding which has power and can be utilised as a studio, workshop or study.
External features include a single carport, three garden sheds, fully landscaped gardens and a variety of abundant fruit trees.
Located within close proximity to major shopping precincts, primary and secondary schools and easy access to public transport, this is a property suited to many buyer groups so be quick.

Description:
Why Pay for Big?
This is the ideal townhouse to start out in or downsize to. It's on its' own title, it's low maintenance, it's on the corner of a quiet court and it's a great price. Walk into the lounge and you'll feel right at home. With the economy of gas heating and a ceiling fan, you'll be comfortable all year round. Relax on the couch and ponder life as you gaze out of the floor to ceiling windows to the world outside. Both bedrooms have built-in robes and are located at the far end of the home, with the convenience of the bathroom and separate toilet nearby. The cute kitchen is compact but still has plenty of storage. With everything in easy reach, you'll be happy to spend time cooking up a storm. The dining area adjoins the kitchen and is large enough to host dinners when family and friends come to visit. Air conditioning and a ceiling fan means things will never get too heated. The sliding door in the dining area leads out to an enclosed, private paved area. Build a fernery, add some lounges and make it your own sanctuary to escape the hustle and bustle of the every day. The front garden is big enough to satisfy your green thumb but small enough that you can maintain it yourself. With a single garage alongside, a potential rental return of $250-$270 and a block size of 280sqm, this one is definitely worth a look. Contact us to register your interest.
Insights: 2 Katarina Place, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2017 and 6 other 2 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
A Solid Family Home or Investment
This solid brick home offers ample space to accommodate families or couples entering the market, or alternatively investors looking to secure a sold property on a substantially sized allotment.
Situated on approx. 730m2, this home comprises:
• 4 spacious bedrooms, all with BIR and master with fully renovated ensuite
• 2 spacious living areas
• Expansive kitchen with ample bench space and gas cooking
• Flexible study nook
• Beautifully renovated 2nd bathroom
• Polished timber floors throughout
• Gas ducted heating
• Open meals area that opens to covered pergola
• Huge double garage with power & ample storage/workshop/gym space
• Bungalow/kids play room at rear of property
Conveniently located closely to all major amenities including the Bellarine Village Shopping Centre, multiple schooling options, recreational facilities, the Gordon TAFE and public transport, this truly is an appealing location to reside.

Description:
Great for investment or to live in.
Whether you're looking for something to move the family into for an exciting start to 2018, or for a steady investment with great potential for capital growth, this is a fantastic opportunity.
The property is in a vastly improving area, located only minutes from local shopping, schooling, medical centres and the Bellarine Highway. Public transport is extremely accessible as well, with a bus stop located right in front of the home!
The home itself is in great condition throughout. The main living and dining are fitted with carpets that are only 5 years old. The kitchen was updated at the same time and was renovated to be very open, modern and sleek. The home boasts 3 bedrooms of good size, 2 of which have built in robes and ceiling fans, while the bathroom is in very well-maintained original condition.
The house is also sitting on a large block of 649sqm, which allows for a huge backyard and a double garage as well as the long driveway which can easily fit 2 more cars. This property has it all, don't miss out!

Description:
Prosper in the potential.
With 1166m2 of land to work with the possibilities are endless - Renovate or develop. S.T.C.A.
The existing double storey home boasts three bedrooms all with built in robes, master bedroom with ensuite, open plan kitchen/dining/family room, large entry with adjacent formal lounge and family bathroom.
Upstairs houses the third bedroom with the option of a retreat or study.
Features include electric heating and cooling unit, gas upright cooking, walk in pantry and timber look flooring throughout.
Garaging consists of three bays with roller doors plus large work shop areas and substantial concrete slabs in place for further constructions S.T.C.A.
Situated in a substantial capital growth area within walking distance to schools and only minutes from Bellarine Shopping Village and Newcomb Centro.

Description:
Spacious 2 Bedroom Unit – A neat & tidy home.
Wow, a complete package for anyone looking to purchase their first home, investment or downsizing. This extremely well looked after unit offers open plan living, separate kitchen, two spacious bedroom with BIR’s, large laundry and a central bathroom. The home is temperature controlled by gas heating and ducted cooling with ceiling fans for added circulation. Security shutters are installed on all windows, with security doors on front and back entrances for peace of mind. Consisting of a single car garage with remote, added parking for a caravan or boat and low maintenance all round off a complete package. Only two units on the block with a secure front gate, this property is a must for inspection.

Description:
Start Me Up
Whether you are a first home buyer, investor or you like to flip homes this is one to sink your teeth into. While needing works to make it habitable, it offers loads of space and an abundance of potential. With 4 generous bedrooms, huge living space that flows from the lounge, dining and kitchen plus a second sunroom at the rear. It will be hard to find better value in this market. Totally separate and sitting on a corner allotment of 387 sqm, this is a great place to invest. Handy to schools, shops, transport and offering easy access into Geelong's centre and waterfront plus a few turns and you are on your way to the beautiful Bellerine Peninsula. See the possibilities, be decisive and bid strong.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Invest or Own Now!
Perfect start to own or invest in your first, next or even last property. This super neat 1 bedroom unit can't wait to be yours. Stylish floors, white venetian blinds and brick feature wall greet you as you step inside to your open plan living zone with reverse cycle split system. Kitchen has electric stove and pantry. Laundry has linen storage and rear access to private courtyard. Bedroom has 2 single wardrobes, one with shelves and the other for hanging. Bathroom has single vanity basin, toilet and separate shower. Your very own secure off street carport is another bonus here. Sort after location just 12 minutes to Geelong CBD and Waterfront precinct. Only a 3 minute drive or 15 minute walk to Newcomb Central Shopping Centre. Previously tenanted at $190 per week you can't go wrong here, acquire it now!

Description:
Compact 3 bedroom home in a quiet court!
This 3 bedroom compact home sits on its own title and is perfect for downsizing or for the astute investor all located in a very quiet court. The floor plan highlights 3 bedrooms with BIRs, separate lounge, open plan dining and kitchen with access to the rear to yard. There is a good sized bathroom with full sized bath and shower, separate toilet and a laundry room. A two car lock up garage with ample storage and rear access to the home. Added to this is a split system A/C and gas ducted heating throughout, low maintenance gardens and a private courtyard. There is also added parking space at front of the home ideal for caravan storage. Located only minutes drive to Geelong’s CBD, Newcomb Central shopping centre, schools and sporting facilities. You couldn't ask for a better location. A must inspection.

Description:
By private appointment only
Situated on a generous 590 m2 (approx.) this well presented & maintained solid brick home might be the home youve been searching for. Whether you are looking for an investment property or your first home this home will certainly tick all the boxes! Just a short distance to local schools, shops and transport and within close proximity to the Bellarine Highway, this home not only offers convenience & quality life style but a place to call home.
Comprising 3 cozy bedrooms all with BIR, this welcoming home offers an open plan kitchen with living area featuring quality kitchen appliances throughout, central gas heating, split system air-conditioning. The central bathroom and toilet service all of the bedrooms. The rear yard offers plenty of room for both children and pets.
As we head outside the single lock-up garage and extended carport provide additional parking space with plenty of room for extra storage. The fantastic outdoor entertaining area coupled with the secure and private backyard you are sure to be impressed.
This home offers low maintenance and convenient living in a fantastic central location and is absolutely ideal for a young couple or first home buyer entering the market or brilliant for the savvy investor to add to their portfolio. Currently leased at $295 per week, this property is a MUST see.

Description:
Your New Project on 855 sqm
Roll your sleeves up and prepare to do some work. The current owners have already started, you just need to finish it off. This brick veneer home is just waiting to be brought up to its full potential. The entry is set securely behind the carport roller door, giving you security and privacy. To the left of the entry is the living area with ceiling fan and bay windows that let in loads of light. It's the ideal place to sit back, watch some TV and relax. You'll be comfortable all year round with evap cooling, ducted heating and a wall furnace. Two bedrooms have built-in robes while the master has a walk-in robe with a section especially to show off your shoe collection. The conveniently located bathroom is a work in progress. While the luxurious bath has already been installed, the rest is waiting for you to design. Create the bathroom you've always wanted, it's totally up to you. The kitchen is perfect for the aspiring chef with a huge stainless steel oven and cook top, dishwasher and flexible commercial mixer tap. With plenty of storage, and subway tiles adding to the overall feel, you won't mind spending your time cooking up a storm. The kitchen overlooks the dining area which has sliding doors out to the decked alfresco. Your summer nights are set, just fire up the barbecue, crack a coldie and enjoy. The alfresco leads out to a second deck offering extra space for family get togethers. The property backs on to the Bellarine Rail Trail, all you need to do install a gate and you're good to go for a run or take the dog for a slow amble. The huge garage provides enough room to store your car and to tinker in the workshop, while behind the garage is a water tank. Don't let this one pass you by, your hard work will be rewarded.
Insights: 6 Galaxy Court, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2017 and 30 other 3 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
Make Your Home Owner Dreams A Reality!
Whether you're yearning to make your homeowner dreams a reality, looking to start an investment portfolio, this is the property for you! Proximity to the shops, cafes, and supermarkets on the Bellarine Highway is a huge plus, while easy access to local primary schools and Newcomb Secondary College puts the foundations in place for easy family living. Featuring a high front fence and established gardens, you'll appreciate the sense of privacy this property offers. The living zone overlooks the backyard, while the kitchen/dining zone features timber floorboards. The kitchen is equipped with a built-in pantry and appliances including a dishwasher, oven, gas hob and rangehood.
Three bedrooms, complete with built-in robes and ceiling fans, share close access to the updated bathroom. Boasting a large semi-frameless shower and bathtub, the bathroom hints at the potential this home has to offer. A laundry with storage completes the floorplan. A gas wall heater and air conditioner/heating unit provides additional comfort.
The secure backyard offers plentiful space for children and pets, while the sheltered alfresco deck is perfect for fun family gatherings. The fourth bedroom/single lock-up garage and long carport provide ample off-street parking. Two garden sheds and a rainwater tank add the final touches to this potential-packed property. Inspect ASAP!
- A terrific choice for first homebuyers, investors, or keen renovators (STCA)
- Generous living zone and open plan kitchen/dining zone
- Three bedrooms with built-in robes and updated bathroom
- Secure and spacious backyard with sheltered alfresco deck
- Single lock-up garage/fourth bedroom and long carport provides off-street parking
- Proximity to local schools and the Bellarine Highway shops

Description:
Dressed to impress.
As soon as you enter this family home you are wowed with space and quality. This quiet achiever comprises of master bedroom suite with ensuite and large walk in robe, a further three bedrooms all with built in robes and central family bathroom, open plan kitchen/dining/lounge area, formal lounge and theatre/rumpus room.
The kitchen features gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher, granit benchtops and walk in pantry. Other features include an abundance of storage with the walk in linen cupboard, evaporative cooling and gas ducted heating through out.
Outside enjoy the landscaped gardens and manicured lawns while relaxing on the north facing outdoor entertaining area which is decked and partially undercover to suite all climates.
Currently leased until January 2018 at $395 per week.
